mapper.select: SELECT c.LINK AS link, pc.PRODUCT_ID AS productId FROM CONTENT c LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_CONTENT pc ON pc.CONTENT_ID = c.ID WHERE c.JOB_ID = #{jobId} FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO CLICKS c USING (SELECT #{productId} AS productId, #{ip} AS ip FROM dual) src ON (c.PRODUCT_ID = src.productId AND c.IP = src.ip) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PRODUCT_ID, IP, CLICKED_AT) VALUES (src.productId, src.ip, SYSTIMESTAMP)
